def_en: If you straddle something, you put or have one leg on either side of it.

def_cn: 横跨，跨越(河流、道路、边境等)
def_en: If something straddles a river, road, border, or other place, it stretches across it or exists on both sides of it.

def_cn: 横跨，跨越，同属(不同时期、群体或活动领域等)
def_en: Someone or something that straddles different periods, groups, or fields of activity exists in, belongs to, or takes elements from them all.
